creator: Solitaire Card Games Classic
descriptionHtml:
🚀 Solitaire Game x Rescue Story Episode 💥

All-new Classic Solitaire card game, enriched with thrilling story episodes! 👻

HURRY UP! 😱 The fate of the rescue mission lies in your hands! Your friends in Solitaire Rescue 2 are counting on your aid! 🏃‍♂️

🆘✅ Your Rescue Mission is Clear:

① Train your brain and conquer Solitaire card game.
② Win card deals to help your friends in the storyline.
③ Fix problems, mend broken story situations.
④ Let your warm-heartedness shine as you restore harmony!

🔮 Follow the storyline and get ready to face a series of intriguing stories:

From a struggling family 😭 and heartbroken lady 💔 to a lonely tiger 🐯, thirsty fish 🐟, and endangered animals 🐼... and so on 👽
They're all desperately counting on YOUR HELP! 💡

🧩 Game's Highlights

♣ Classic Solitaire card game
♣ Follow the fun stories
♣ Easy but addictive game
♣ Unlock new story episodes
♣ 100% free to play game
♣ Sharpen your brain and find joy.
♣ Perfect time killer and IQ boost.
♣ Exciting challenge & events
♣ Customizable card themes
♣ Customizable backgrounds
♣ Unlimited free undo
♣ Crisp and easy-to-read cards
♣ 1-card or 3-card flip mode
♣ Playable online and offline
♣ No internet, no wifi required
♣ Both online and offline playable.

📬 Contact Solitaire Rescue 2 support team at: SolitaireRescue@linkdesks.com

Wait no more! 🔥 Roll up your sleeves and start the Solitaire Rescue mission! 🤸‍♀️

title:
Solitaire Story
1.23.0

container.value: Room 817, Building 33, NO. 680 Guiping Road, Xuhui District, Shanghai, China, 200233

creator: Solitaire Card Games Classic
descriptionHtml:
🚀 Save Lives, Solve Cards, and Unravel Stories! 💥

Welcome to Solitaire Story — where every card you play brings you closer to a heartwarming rescue! 🃏💖
Your friends are in trouble… and only your Solitaire skills can save them! 🌟

⚡ Step Up for the Rescue Mission!

✅ Outsmart card challenges to unlock gripping stories.
✅ Help friends in need — from heartbroken souls 💔 to stranded animals 🐯🐟🐼.
✅ Make choices that mend lives and restore harmony.
✅ Feel the joy of bringing happiness to those who count on you! 🙌

🔮 Every Level Tells a Story!

A family facing hardship 😢, a lonely tiger 🐯 longing for a friend, a fish 🐟 in need of water... and mysteries that go beyond this world 👽.
Each rescue mission is a journey of kindness and surprises! 💡

🧩 Why Players Love Solitaire Story?

♣ Classic Solitaire with an emotional twist
♣ Unlock stories that tug at your heartstrings
♣ Easy to play, hard to put down
♣ Fresh episodes added regularly
♣ Free to play anytime, anywhere
♣ Perfect mix of fun, challenge, and feel-good moments
♣ Customize your cards and backgrounds to suit your style
♣ Helpful hints & unlimited undos for a relaxing experience
♣ Choose between 1-card or 3-card flip modes
♣ No internet? No problem—play offline!

📬 Need assistance? Reach us at: SolitaireStory@linkdesks.com

🔥 Ready to flip cards and flip lives? Join Solitaire Story now and become the hero everyone needs! 🤸‍♀️
descriptionShort: Play solitaire and help those in need! Spread love and compassion!

③ Fix problems, mend broken story situations.
④ Let your warm-heartedness shine as you restore harmony!

🔮 Follow the storyline and get ready to face a series of intriguing stories:

From a struggling family 😭 and heartbroken lady 💔 to a lonely tiger 🐯, thirsty fish 🐟, and endangered animals 🐼... and so on 👽
They're all desperately counting on YOUR HELP! 💡

🧩 Game's Highlights

♣ Classic Solitaire card game
♣ Follow the fun stories
♣ Easy but addictive game
♣ Unlock new story episodes
♣ 100% free to play game
♣ Sharpen your brain and find joy.
♣ Perfect time killer and IQ boost.
♣ Exciting challenge & events
♣ Customizable card themes
♣ Customizable backgrounds
♣ Unlimited free undo
♣ Crisp and easy-to-read cards
♣ 1-card or 3-card flip mode
♣ Playable online and offline
♣ No internet, no wifi required
♣ Both online and offline playable.

📬 Contact Solitaire Story support team at: SolitaireStory@linkdesks.com

Wait no more! 🔥 Roll up your sleeves and start the Solitaire Story rescue mission! 🤸‍♀️
